name: somethin' Duck
description:
Ludum Dare 40 Post-Compo Version of my submission: 

"somethin' Duck" 

Play the Compo Version Here!

Rate the Compo version here!

In this Snake-like Survival game you play as a Mama-Duck and have to make and raise as many little ducklings as you can. The more ducklings you have the more points you will receive but it will also attract more nasty crocodiles and snakes! 

Avoid these at all cost!

Instructions:

Use Arrow Keys to Move.

Touch other ducks to make little ducklings.

Eat Toast Slices to grow your ducklings.

Avoid Snakes and Crocodiles!

Hit the back of a crocodiles head to knock it out!
